# The `InsertElementInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This instruction inserts a single (scalar) element into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> value. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::InsertElementInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This instruction inserts a single (scalar) element into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> value.
